I have this simple code snippet:
...
h =3D new Heritrix();
...
h.start();
h=
.launch("file:" + f.getAbsolutePath(), true);
...
CrawlJob crawljob =3D job=
Handler.getCurrentJob();
...

How come sometimes I got crawljob is null? Al=
so, is it true that
when a crawljob is finished, crawljob will be set to nu=
ll? I have
a loop that periodically poll the value of crawljob and uses it
=
to report the job status.  Is this a correct way to do it? 
I think my ques=
tion is, how can I reliably poll the status of a
crawl job?

Thanks.
